column5: Was rainy and windy all morning.....saw an opening in the sky this afternoon so I went out fast with the intention of picking up a pickerel or two. Still very windy...whitecaps everywhere. So, I  ran an orange and gold original rap behind a 2 ounce bottom bouncer and picked this little guy up. Gunna be eating it in a few miutes with pork ribs. BTW  I saw a couple of very large muskies in the shallows...just sunning.  I'll head out tomorrow with J for some fishing.  Be well everyone.
Good for you Roy!  I am sure that the boat enjoy being in the water....oh and nice fish!!  hehe    bly
I love you too, Carole.
What a beaut, and the fish aint too bad either  Bet that's gonna be delicious Roy.  Enjoy.  Joey
I'm feeling a little queasy here right now.  I should be more careful with what I read.

Good on ya Roy!!!!!!!!!! Nice to hear that your actually able to get out. every now an then 'specially when your so close to musky heaven....Some may think otherwise but I do happen to know that you are one man with a more then full schedule and more responsibilities then anyone one person should be carrying. Again....good on ya Bud.....enjoy that tasty 'pick this evening. pete
Enjoy the meal! The orange rapala is also a favourite lure of mine for pickeral in the Kawarthas, especially at night and my buddy uses it for pike!
Roy,nicely done for a couple of hrs fishing,Tomorrow go get the two that you saw WTG  .  Steve
I hear ya doug!!!.. and that camera angle gave me the willies!!!!
And whats up with leaving the price tag on your new jeans?
That was just part of it Dan... lookin' up to Roy... well... it just aint natural!
I don't think you can return them once you've wet yourself !!!
It's a whistle...blow it! :-)
One of them itty bitty dog whistles?
OMG.... I'm laughing so hard I can hardly type. Seriously Roy. Nice fish Bud.
Yeah, it attracts the green coach breed.
Nice fish bud.Why is it you only catch fish when you are alone?Could it be we just yacked too much last outing or your not telling me where the reall hot spots are.I think GCD likes whistles
Cuban Rum attracts them better!  MTP... I got yer whistle Bubba.....
Ignore those dang southern rednecks.   Nice fish Roy.
Ahhhh... wouldn't it be nice if ya could?
Huh? Who?
Well done Roy! Just glad to see ya out and about  Whopper
Thats a real nice fish bud. As for that whistle,good on ya for having it tied on. Safety first.
Roy must be pretty talented if he can blow his own whistle.  Nice fish there bud!
Awesome pic bud.. looks like your playing the banjo!!
